title: You
content:
Card rules text will often refer to “you.” In these cases, the rule applies to the person who drew or played that card, or to the person performing that test. If you are ever unsure as to which Ranger a rule applies, the group decides who it affects.

  • If a card is cleared on your turn, "you" are considered to have cleared this card for other rules.
  • If harm or progress are placed by challenge effects on your turn, you are not considered to have placed those.
